column5: Newly remodeled master bedroom suit with private entrance and bath. Close to Main. Two blocks from the Pacific War Museum, Otto's, Tubby's and wine shuttle pick-up. Great location to explore FBG on foot. Private small outside area with a 380 SF room. Shared wall (insulated) with one other full BNB apartment and my house. Read \
column8: Der Zimmer - three blocks & walkable from main
